duplicate.info: Duplicate data refers to data with the same URI address and the same username.
duplicate.tip: All operations will not change the data file you selected, if you want to save the data after operation, please click download above.

empty.supported: Only unprotected json format is supported

info: This is a small project to curate {bitwarden} data.
The project is completely offline, you can operate it directly on this site, or go to {github} to download the source code and build it yourself.

background.title: background
info: Under normal circumstances, the data in Bitwarden will not be duplicated.
But because I have done data migration in various password management software, resulting in duplicate data.
Although repeated data does not affect the use, it is uncomfortable after all. Taking advantage of some time a few years ago, there was this project.

feature.title: feature
list: Browser data cache, convenient to continue processing next time
Editing and deleting of data and folders

use.title: use
info: First, you need to export Bitwarden data to json format.
Then select your json data file below.
If the data is loaded successfully, you will see the relevant data information at the top of the page.
At this time, you can choose the function you want in the left menu.
Finally, after processing the data, remember to click the download button at the head of the page to download the processed data.
warning: Please make sure that the data you export from Bitwarden can be imported into Bitwarden normally without any processing, and the data is complete.
This project cannot guarantee the security of your data, please back up your data yourself.
